root.name: Mobile Suit Gundam: Gundam vs. Gundam Next
root.description: Units IncludedCurrently confirmed units in Mobile Suit Gundam: Gundam vs. Gundam NEXT. New units (not including those that debuted in the PSP version of Gundam vs Gundam) are marked with "(new)." Mobile Suit GundamGundam ( Amuro Ray) Guntank ( Hayato Kobayashi) Guncannon ( Kai Shiden) Char Custom Zaku ( Char Aznable) Dom ( Gaia) Acguy (Akahana) (new) Mobile Suit Gundam: The 08th MS TeamGround Gundam Mass Production Type ( Shiro Amada)Gundam Ez-8 ( Shiro Amada) (new) Gouf Custom (Norris Packard) Mobile Suit Gundam 0080: War in the PocketZaku II Custom (Bernard Wiseman) Gundam Alex ( Christina Mackenzie) Kampfer (Mikhail Kaminsky) Mobile Suit Gundam 0083: Stardust MemoryGP-01 Zephyranthes ( Kou Uraki; becomes GP-01 Full Vernian after it is destroyed once) GP-03 Stamen ( Kou Uraki) GP-02 Physalis (Anavel Gato) Mobile Suit Zeta GundamZeta Gundam ( Kamille Bidan) Gundam Mk. II ( Emma Sheen; can switch to Super Gundam at will)Gundam Mk. II Titans Colors ( Kamille Bidan) (new) Hyaku Shiki ( Quattro Bajeena) (new) Quebeley ( Haman Karn) (new) Mobile Suit Gundam ZZZZ Gundam ( Judau Ashta) Quebeley Mk. II ( Elpeo Puru)Quebeley Mk. II Red ( Puru Two) (new) Hamma Hamma (Mashymre Cello) (new) Mobile Suit Gundam: Char's CounterattackNu Gundam ( Amuro Ray ver. UC 0093) Sazabi ( Char Aznable ver. UC 0093) Mobile Suit Gundam UnicornUnicorn Gundam (No Pilot) (new) Mobile Suit Gundam F91Gundam F91 ( Seabook Arno) Vigna Ghina (Cecily Fairchild) Mobile Suit Victory GundamVictory 2 Gundam ( Uso Evin; can switch to Victory 2 Gundam Assault Buster for a limited time) Victory Gundam ( Uso Evin) Gedlav ( Katejina Loos) (new) Mobile Fighter G GundamShining Gundam ( Domon Kasshu) (new)God Gundam ( Domon Kasshu) Master Gundam ( Master Asia) Gundam Spiegel (Schwarz Bruder) (new) Nobel Gundam ( Allenby Beardsley) (new) New Mobile Report Gundam Wing(all designs use the TV version)Wing Gundam Zero ( Heero Yuy) Gundam Heavyarms Custom (Trowa Barton) Gundam Deathscythe Hell (Duo Maxwell) (new) Gundam Epyon ( Zechs Merquise) (new) Tallgeese ( Zechs Merquise) (new) After War Gundam XGundam X ( Garrod Ran)Gundam Double X ( Garrod Ran) (new) Gundam Virsago (Shagia Frost) Turn A GundamTurn A Gundam ( Loran Cehack) Kapool (Sochie Heim) Turn X ( Gym Ghingnham) (new) Mobile Suit Gundam SEEDStrike Gundam ( Kira Yamato)Freedom Gundam ( Kira Yamato; was originally part of Gundam SEED Destiny in the first game) Aegis Gundam ( Athrun Zala) Duel Gundam Assault Shroud (Yzak Joule; becomes standard Duel Gundam after "Armor Purge "attack) (new) Mobile Suit Gundam SEED DestinyImpulse Gundam ( Shinn Asuka) Destiny Gundam ( Shinn Asuka) Strike Freedom Gundam ( Kira Yamato ver. CE 73) (new) Akatsuki ( Neo Roanoke; can switch between "Oowashi" and "Shiranui" packs in battle) (new) Mobile Suit Gundam 00Gundam Exia ( Setsuna F. Seiei) Gundam Virtue ( Tieria Erde; becomes Gundam Nadleeh after "Armor Purge" attack) (new)
